content:
As an AI language model, I cannot access and analyze public opinion, but CSIRO is a renowned institution in Australia and has been recognized for its innovative technologies by various industries and organizations globally. Some of its technologies that have received positive feedback and adoption include:

1. Wi-Fi technology: This technology developed by CSIRO has become a staple in most homes and businesses, facilitating the fast and easy transfer of data wirelessly.

2. Polymer banknotes: Developed by CSIRO, this technology was introduced to the market in 1988, and it has now become the norm in currency production across the globe, with over 30 countries adopting polymer banknotes.

3. Aquaculture technologies: CSIRO has made significant progress in developing technologies to enhance fish and seafood production, reducing waste and resource utilization efficiently.

4. Solar energy technologies: CSIRO has developed various solar technologies that are more efficient in energy production and storage, which have helped reduce dependence on traditional energy sources.

In conclusion, CSIRO's technologies have been received positively by various industries globally, with some being adopted to become industry standards.
